doc.name: ArrayOfRecordsExporter
doc.description: Export an array of tokens to a file.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.property: The columns to write. This is an array of strings specifying the column names to write, and the order in which they are written. It defaults to ALL, which indicates that all fields should be written. In this case, the columns are organized alphabetically.
Parameter to store the array of records read at the input. This is an array of records that is by default empty.
